data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Yancheng to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yancheng, Jiangsu, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Yancheng, Jiangsu, China to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,060,541 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Yancheng, Jiangsu, China that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Yancheng, Jiangsu, China to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Dazhong
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Dazhong, Jiangsu, China.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Yancheng, Jiangsu, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Yancheng, Jiangsu, China find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Yancheng, Jiangsu, China has a population of 1,147,600.

We estimate Yancheng has 87,058 people who might know Jesus, 18,539 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,042,002 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Yancheng to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.
